title: some issue with password
body:
hi, i have owncloud 5.0.10 running on freebsd 9.1 and nginx. web interface working great, but one user can't login by owncloud desktop (1.3.0). owncloud logs: error oc_user_webdavauth not possible to connect to webdav url: "" warning php get_headers(http://...@): failed to open stream: operation failed at /usr/home/user/domains/domain.net/public_html/owncloud/apps/user_webdavauth/user_webdavauth.php#45 owncloud desktop logwindow: 08-21 11:23:41:518 connect to url: "https://domain.net/owncloud/" 08-21 11:23:41:518 setup-log: "prã³ba poå‚ä…czenia z owncloud w https://domain.net/owncloud/..." 08-21 11:23:41:518 oo custom config file in use: 08-21 11:23:41:519 going to delete the password from settings file. 08-21 11:23:41:519 oo custom config file in use: "/home/user/.local/share/data//owncloud/owncloud.cfg_082113112341" 08-21 "domain.net" 08-21 11:23:41:522 setting config handle "082113112341" 08-21 11:23:41:576 status.php returns: "{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.17","versionstring":"5.0.10","edition":""}" 0 reply: qnetworkreplyimpl(0x1f346b0) 08-21 11:23:41:576 setup-log: "udane poå‚ä…czenie z https://domain.net/owncloud: owncloud wersja 5.0.10 (5.0.17)

" owncloud desktop gui: the given credentials do not authenticate. finally after couple of hours, i changed user password and now everything work fine. this was the problem. inappropriate password: f02+3yntrn[mnwh"{l94
